Medium: Circular with slightly expanding lip which is fitted with projecting ridge inside; midband,  incised lines at base; on three feet; light brown clay, crackled creamy white glaze; silver cover (White Satsuma ware)
Dimensions: H. (with lid) 3 1/4 in. (8.3 cm); Diam. 3 5/8 in. (9.2 cm)
Credit Line: The Howard Mansfield Collection, Gift of Howard Mansfield, 1936
